actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to make technical improvements in the tax laws.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code with respect to the authority of the Secretary of the Treasury to impose additional tax liabilities on corporations and citizens of foreign nations which impose discriminatory taxes on United States citizens and corporations to extend such authority to discriminatory taxes imposed on subsidiaries and corporations owned by United States citizens.

titles.title: A bill to make technical improvements in the tax laws.
